title: Venom Spiderman crossover:Venom Director Ruben Fleischer Confirms Crossover With Spider-Man, Says They'll 'Confront Each Other'
text:
When Venom had released last October, it went to become the seventh-highest grossing movie of the year with a collection of USD 850 million. However, it received mixed reviews. After the grand success, a sequel, Venom 2, is in the works already, but Ruben Fleischer, the helmer of the original, has stepped out of the director’s chair letting Andy Serkis take the chair.

hnentertainment.co

But that doesn’t mean that Ruben Fleischer doesn’t know about the movie’s fate. In an interview with Fandom, he said Tom Hardy’s Venom and Tom Holland’s Spider-Man are destined to confront each other. “That’s where it’s all going to lead,” he said.





reddit.com

“And that’s the exciting thing, because we changed the origin of Venom… in the comics, he evolved from Spider-Man but because of the Marvel-Sony thing we weren’t able to that. And so the thing I think it’s building towards, and will be exciting to see, is when they actually do confront each other.”

Twitter

So, will Tom Hardy share screen space with Tom Holland in the next Venom movie itself? That remains to be seen. Sony Producer Amy Pascal also said that Tom Hardy will be back in Venom 2. “I can say that Tom Hardy will be back, magnificently playing that character as no one else can.”

Twitter

About Andy Serkis taking over Venom 2, Ruben Fleischer said, “If anything, I would have changed the critics’ reaction to it. I was really bummed that people didn’t like it because it’s a crowd-pleasing movie and I’m not sure if there was just blow-back against Sony or people just worship Marvel.”

Twitter

“But I was really surprised that the critics [were gunning for it] because audiences really enjoyed the movie. And so many people who’ve seen it just appreciated that it was a fun superhero movie. So I was a little surprised. I don’t know what they were expecting.”

Venom 2, meanwhile, is slated to hit the screens in 2020.
